overview:
StrataScale, Inc., a subsidiary of RagingWire Enterprise Solutions, Inc., provides leading on-demand server hosting solutions featuring Public and Private Cloud, as well as Dedicated Server Hosting options.

StrataScale services are built on our 220,000 sq. ft world-class data center. The facility is engineered for â€œfive ninesâ€ (99.999%) availability through N+2 full redundancy, financial-grade security, and award-winning environmental efforts.

StrataScale offers a complete suite of enterprise-class server hosting options to meet the IT infrastructure needs of businesses of all sizes. From traditional dedicated servers, to the worldâ€™s first automated managed hosting, to our series of public, private, and hybrid cloud services, what you get is near instantaneous delivery and scalability. Mix and match Automated Server Hosting with our Cloud servers from the same secure web portal for maximum user and cost efficiency. Finish ahead of schedule and under budget with StrataScale. StrataScale delivers flexibility, scalability, and cost efficiencies when max IT infrastructure security, reliability, and performance are critical.

With StrataScale automated hosting solutions, things that typically take hours or days, like bringing a server up, adding storage, and repurposing a server, now can be done in minutes. The result: you can focus on your applications and your customers by getting IT provisioning and configuration work done instantly and easily, in real-time - while StrataScale monitors and manages your IT infrastructure around the clock.

â€¢ Peace of mind: youâ€™re in good hands. Enterprise-class components, guaranteed 99.999% availability, expert engineering and support, financial-grade security.

StrataScale hosting, featuring our industry-pacing automated architecture, is designed to meet the needs of startups, SMB/SME, and enterprise companies. StrataScale has solutions for compute needs like mission critical data storage, applications hosting, disaster recovery, web hosting, software dev, and e-commerce.
